confirmDate.name: Confirm Date
confirmDate.descriptionUser: Please communicate with your host to confirm a date for your lecture.
confirmDate.descriptionAssignee: Please communicate with the speaker to confirm a date for this lecture.

confirmNeedComPoster.name: Do you need a commissioned poster?
confirmNeedComPoster.descriptionUser: You can choose to have a free commissioned poster for your lecture or to design a poster yourself. Beware: You have no editorial control over commissioned posters.

confirmPosterDesigner.name: Invite a Poster Designer
confirmPosterDesigner.descriptionUser: We will invite a poster designer to create a poster for your lecture. You will have no editorial control over the poster.
confirmPosterDesigner.descriptionAssignee: Please invite a poster designer to create a poster for this lecture.

submitPoster.name: Submit Poster
submitPoster.descriptionUser: Please wait while we create a poster for you.
submitPoster.descriptionAssignee: Please upload the poster you designed. It must be an image.

inviteTeacher.name: Invite a Teacher
inviteTeacher.descriptionUser: Please wait while we invite a teacher to provide feedback.
inviteTeacher.descriptionAssignee: Send this link to a teacher to invite them to this lecture. They will approve the presentation and provide feedback on lecture day.

teacherApprovePresentation.name: Presentation Approval
teacherApprovePresentation.descriptionUser: Please wait while the teacher approves your presentation.
teacherApprovePresentation.descriptionAssignee: Please approve the presentation for this lecture.

schoolApprovePoster.name: Poster Approval
schoolApprovePoster.descriptionUser: Please wait while the school approves your poster.
schoolApprovePoster.descriptionAssignee: Send this link to a faculty member to approve the poster for this lecture.

confirmLocation.name: Confirm Location
confirmLocation.descriptionUser: Please wait while we assign a location for your lecture.
confirmLocation.descriptionAssignee: Please assign the location of this lecture.

testDevice.name: Test Device
testDevice.descriptionUser: Together, you and your host will test the device you will use for your lecture.
testDevice.descriptionAssignee: Please contact the speaker to schedule a time for device testing.

createGroupChat.name: Create Group Chat
createGroupChat.descriptionUser: Your host will create a group chat for you and your audience where you can distribute materials in.
createGroupChat.descriptionAssignee: Please create a group chat for this lecture.

inviteParticipants.name: Invite Initial Participants
inviteParticipants.descriptionUser: You need to invite at least 5 initial participants to your lecture. Consider inviting your friends!
inviteParticipants.descriptionAssignee: You need to invite at least 5 initial participants to your lecture. Consider inviting your friends!

sendAdvertisements.name: Send Advertisements
sendAdvertisements.descriptionUser: Your host will help you send advertisements to attract more participants to your lecture.
sendAdvertisements.descriptionAssignee: Please distribute advertisements in BAID Students and BAID Alumni.

updateLiveAudience.name: Update Live Audience
updateLiveAudience.descriptionUser: Please wait while we update the live audience for your lecture.
updateLiveAudience.descriptionAssignee: Please update the live audience for this lecture.

submitFeedback.name: Submit Feedback
submitFeedback.descriptionUser: Please wait while your host and your teacher provide feedback on your lecture.
submitFeedback.descriptionAssignee: Please upload a picture of the feedback form.

submitVideo.name: Submit Video
submitVideo.descriptionUser: Please wait while we upload the video of your lecture.
submitVideo.descriptionAssignee: Please upload the video of this lecture.

submitReflection.name: Submit Reflection
submitReflection.descriptionUser: Your host will schedule a time for you to record a reflection video on your lecture.
submitReflection.descriptionAssignee: Please schedule a time for the speaker to record a reflection video on this lecture, and upload this video.

lectureLogs.assignedHost: {{user}} assigned {{assignee}} as the host for this lecture.
lectureLogs.assignedTeacher: {{teacher}} accepted the invitation to be the teacher for this lecture.
lectureLogs.confirmedNeedComPoster: {{user}} confirmed that they need a commissioned poster.
lectureLogs.confirmedSelfDesignPoster: {{user}} confirmed that they will design their own poster.
lectureLogs.assignedPosterDesigner: {{assignee}} was invited to design a poster for this lecture.
lectureLogs.submittedPoster: {{user}} submitted a poster for this lecture.
lectureLogs.submittedPresentation: {{user}} submitted a presentation for this lecture.
lectureLogs.approvedPoster: {{external}} approved the poster for this lecture.
lectureLogs.createdGroupChat: {{assignee}} uploaded the QR code for the group chat for this lecture.
lectureLogs.invitedParticipants: {{user}} confirmed inviting initial participants to this lecture.
lectureLogs.sentAdvertisements: {{assignee}} confirmed sending advertisements for this lecture.
lectureLogs.teacherApproved: {{teacher}} approved the presentation for this lecture.
lectureLogs.confirmedLocation: {{assignee}} changed the location of this lecture to {{location}}.
lectureLogs.testedDevice: {{assignee}} confirmed that the device was tested for this lecture.
lectureLogs.updatedLiveAudience: {{assignee}} updated the live audience amount to {{audience}} for this lecture.
lectureLogs.submittedFeedback: {{assignee}} uploaded the feedback form for this lecture.
lectureLogs.submittedVideo: {{assignee}} uploaded the video for this lecture.
lectureLogs.submittedReflection: {{assignee}} uploaded the reflection video for this lecture.
lectureLogs.modifiedStatus: {{user}} modified the status of this lecture to {{status}}.

waiting.name: Waiting for Host
waiting.details: Please wait while we assign a host for your lecture. Your host will help you throughout your BAID Speaker journey.

completingPreTasks.name: Completing Pre-Tasks
completingPreTasks.details: In this stage, you will complete all the tasks required to prepare for your lecture.

ready.name: Ready
ready.details: Your lecture is ready to go!

completingPostTasks.name: Completing Post-Tasks
completingPostTasks.details: It's not over just yet! In this stage, you will complete all the tasks required after your lecture.

nav.betaDetails: The BAID Speaker platform is in beta testing. Please report any issues you find to Lin.

createCard.title: Start Your Next Lecture
createCard.subtitle: It's time to start! BAID Speaker is a transformative experience and your next step to becoming a school influencer. It all starts with a lecture.

tutorialCard.title: Quick Guide
tutorialCard.subtitle: Not sure where to start? Read this quick guide to learn about the BAID Speaker process.

watchCard.title: What's the Magic?
watchCard.subtitle: Watching some previous BAID Speakers can help you understand what makes a lecture great.

dashboard.message: Good luck on your lecture! We can't wait to see what you have to offer.
dashboard.messageReady: It's all set! Your lecture is ready to go. Good luck!
dashboard.messagePost: Thank you for your lecture! We hope you had a fabulous time.
dashboard.hostMessage: Your host will help you throughout your BAID Speaker journey and will host your lecture on the big day.
dashboard.teacherMessage: Your teacher will help you review your content and provide feedback on your lecture.

tasks.empty: You have no tasks to complete right now. Congratulations!

people.message: These people are involved in your lecture. They can access the information associated with your lecture. Feel free to contact them for help.
people.name: Name
people.speaker: Speaker

create.title: Start Your Next Lecture
create.details: To get started, you will need to fill out the following information. <1>All questions are required. Please answer in <2>Chinese</2>.</1>

form.title: What's the title of your lecture?
form.contact: Please share your WeChat ID or WeChat phone number so we can contact you.
form.preSurveyQ1: Please tell us about the content of your lecture.
form.preSurveyQ2: Why did you choose this topic?

createError.title: Cannot Start Lecture Yet
createError.message: You can only have one active lecture at once. You may start your next lecture when you finish the previous one.
